name: Carcassonne: The River
summary: Carcassonne: The River, an expansion for Carcassonne: The Official Board game, lets you embellish your landscape while changing up the starting location. The River is made up of 11 tiles, which replace the starting tile. Take turns placing the River tiles while also deploying meeples. Once you've used up the River tiles, continue playing as usual with the other tiles.
